details.text_1: The war still going on is making itself felt, and we see how challenging it has become to raise funds, but we also see that you are unyielding and continue to donate to us tirelessly!
details.text_3: There hasn't been a single day when we haven't spent a significant amount on the needs of civilians and the military, and unfortunately, with the arrival of colder weather, these needs have grown.
details.text_4: We understand you and your fatigue; it's normal. Nevertheless, we still urge everyone who cares about the fate of our Ukraine to follow the rule of at least 10 hryvnias. Because generosity is not measured by how much money you send, but by how much you give from what you have.

directions.text_1: Supply of military equipment, including high-quality gear and personal protective equipment.
directions.text_2: We provide products and necessary items for people whose homes have been destroyed or damaged.
directions.text_3: We provide medical assistance and supply medications for the treatment of the wounded and those in need of help.
directions.text_4: We provide animals with feeding and necessary assistance to give them a chance of survival in challenging conditions.

contacts.contact: Contact Center at Mykolaiv City Council
